Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 30th overall pick, by Houston in 2015...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/1/2015, off Lawrence Barber (KC)...
Drove in 6 runs against Brooklyn on 4/9/2015...
Drove in 6 runs against Boston on 5/15/2015...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago on 2/21/2016 to a 6-year deal worth $12,555,000 per year...
Was selected to the 2016 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Boston on 8/16/2016...
Had 5 hits with 6 RBI against Boston on 5/27/2017...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/29/2017, hitting .478 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Brooklyn on 6/7/2017...
Was selected to the 2017 Allstar game...
Injured on 8/11/2017 with a Torn Calf Muscle, out for 6 weeks...
Injured on 10/10/2017 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for one week...
Was selected to the 2018 Allstar game...
Injured on 8/2/2018 with a Strained Bicep Muscle, out for 2-3 weeks...
Won Gold Glove at Shortstop in 2018...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against St. Louis (B) on 7/6/2019...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/14/2019, hitting .522 with 0 HR, 5 RBI...
